result.execSummary:
The defendant Dejuan L Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Marijuana. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court
Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dejuan L Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney David Del Busto.  Andrea Lynn Fendry appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
On state motion, Court ordered charge amended to Possession of THC pursuant to s. 24.01 Wis. Stats. to which Defendant plead guilty. Court finds defendant guilty of amended charge.  Court orders a forfeiture in the amount of $50 including costs to be paid by 10-03-2017 or civil judgment.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney David Del Busto.  William G. Davidson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense requests a plea and sentencing date.  All parties are notified effective July 29, 2017 this case will be assigned to Judge Thomas J. McAdams, Branch 7, in Room 515 of the Courthouse.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 4, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney David Del Busto.  Andrea Lynn Fendry appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea/sentencing hearing. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned to Branch 10.  Status conference scheduled for July 19, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney David Del Busto.  William G. Davidson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requested plea/sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 6, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney David Del Busto.  Ian Vance-Curzan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned to Branch 10.  Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2017 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Dejuan L Smith
Current: 1433 N 20th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53205   (Effective: 08-05-2015)
Prior: 1433 N 20th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney David Del Busto.  Defendant Dejuan L Smith in custody.  Mark P. Dooley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 31, 2017 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) gj
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Colin P. McGinn appeared earlier in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea and sentencing hearing.  Defendant failing to appear.  On State's motion, the Court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.   Student Intern Patrick O'Keefe under the supervision of Assistant District Attorney Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for plea/sentencing, however, parties request more time. Court will not approve any further adjournments. Case adjourned in branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea and sentencing.  Defense received an amended offer from the state that requires the defendant to complete community service.  Defense requests additional time to allow defendant to complete community service.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 23. All parties are notified that effective September 14, 2015 this case will be assigned to Judge Michelle Ackerman Havas, Branch 45, in Room 515 of the Courthouse due to the rotation of Judge Grady in Branch 23.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith in court with attorney Anne M Jaspers.  Defendant Dejuan L Smith in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  

DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Dejuan L Smith
Current: 1433 N 20th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208   (Effective: 08-05-2015)
Prior: 1421 North 21st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53205
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Dejuan L Smith not in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 7/13/15 @ 1:30 pm
